summary: Armando is the daddy, Cristiano is the adult son. Each of them lives his life in a different way respect the other: Armando is an old play-boy and often he "buys" his women with his money; ... See full summary »
cast: Alberto Sordi|Carlo Verdone|Edy Angelillo|Giuliana Calandra|Ugo Bologna|Angelo Infanti|Victoria Zinny|Gabriele Torrei|Ivana Milan|Tiziana Pini|Ciro Scalera|Francesca Ventura|Andrea Azzarito|Angela Cardile|Ester Carloni|Orsetta Gregoretti|Flora Carabella|Maria Antonietta Bonetti|Germana Di Giannicola|Carmine Faraco|Giuseppe Mannajuolo|Maria Pia Moscatiello|Margie Newton|Paola Rinaldi|Xiomara Rodriguez|Domenico Surace|Alfonso Giganti
title: In viaggio con papà
